casebody.data:
Abraham Van Dolsen et al., appellants, v. William P. Abendroth, respondent. Decided January 5, 1885. Appeal by plaintiff, from judgment entered upon a direction of a verdict for defendant. Carlisle Norwood, Jr., for appellant. Thomas G. Ritch, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Freedman and Russell, JJ.

Per Curiam.

Judgment reversed and new trial ordered,-with costs to abide the event. Durant v. Abendroth, court of appeals, MS. opinion of Rabat,to, J.
